SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities

Interface SceneBorderTouchingWatcher

All Superinterfaces:
Anchorable, Bounded, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider, DirectionProvider, GameNode, MotionModifier, Movable, Placeable, SceneChild, SpeedProvider
public interface SceneBorderTouchingWatcher extends Movable, Bounded, SceneChild
Implement this interface to be notified if the YaegerEntity touches the boundary of the YaegerScene. In that case, the method notifyBoundaryTouching(SceneBorder) will be called.

Note that the boundary of the YaegerScene can be larger that the actual viewable area, if a ScrollableDynamicScene is being used.

  • Method Details

    • notifyBoundaryTouching

      void notifyBoundaryTouching(SceneBorder border)
      This method is being called when this SceneBorderTouchingWatcher touches a border of the YaegerScene.
      Parameters:
      border - the border of the YaegerScene the YaegerEntity is touching

    • watchForBoundaryTouching

      default Updatable watchForBoundaryTouching()
      Return an Updatable that checks if any of the boundaries has been touched on each Updatable.update(long)

      Note: This method is part of the internal API, and should not be used when implementing a Yaeger game.

      Returns:
      an instance of Updatable
